org.mt4j.sceneManagement

Class AddNodeActionThreadSafe

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mt4j.sceneManagement.AddNodeActionThreadSafe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPreDrawAction

    public class AddNodeActionThreadSafe
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreDrawAction
    This class can be used to add a component to another one from a different thread than the main drawing thread. The action has to be registered with a scene to take effect the next time the draw method is called on that scene.
    Author:
    Christopher Ruff
